# Edward Abramson

Edward Abramson (September 21, 1920 â€“ May 10, 2012) was an American politician who served in the New York State Assembly from the 32nd district from 1973 to 1990.
He died of pneumonia and kidney failure on May 10, 2012, in Chiang Mai, Thailand at age 91.
